line.words: Le soleil brille. Le petit cheval noir se promène dans les champs.

subtitle.line: The sun is shining. The little black horse is going for a walk in the fields.
The sun is shining. The little black horse is going for a walk in the fields.
Solen skinner. Den lille, sorte hest går tur på marken.
The sun is shining. The little black horse is going for a walk in the fields.
Le soleil brille. Le petit cheval noir se promène dans les champs.

line.words: Il voit un beau pommier avec une grosse pomme rouge. 'Oh!' dit le petit cheval noir, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

subtitle.line: He sees a beautiful apple tree with a massive red apple. 'Oh! says the little black horse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat that beautiful red apple.'
He sees a beautiful apple tree with a massive red apple. 'Oh! says the little black horse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat that beautiful red apple.'
Han ser et smukt æbletræ med et stort, rødt æble. ”Åh”, siger den lille, sorte hest, ”det er et smukt, rødt æble. Jeg vil virkelig gerne spise det smukke, røde æble.
He sees a beautiful apple tree with a massive red apple. 'Oh! says the little black horse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat that beautiful red apple.'
Il voit un beau pommier avec une grosse pomme rouge. 'Oh!' dit le petit cheval noir, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

line.words: Alors, le petit cheval noir essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

subtitle.line: So, the little black horse tries to pick the apple but it's impossible!
So, the little black horse tries to pick the apple but it's impossible!
Så den lille, sorte hest prøver at plukke æblet, men det er umuligt!
So, the little black horse tries to pick the apple but it's impossible!
Alors, le petit cheval noir essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

line.words: 'Hmmm' dit le petit cheval noir, 'je vais chercher mon ami, le mouton.' Le cheval galope, le cheval galope vers la maison du petit mouton blanc.

subtitle.line: 'Hmmm,' says the little black horse, 'I'll fetch my friend the sheep.' The horse gallops, the horse gallops to the little white sheep's house.
'Hmmm,' says the little black horse, 'I'll fetch my friend the sheep.' The horse gallops, the horse gallops to the little white sheep's house.
“Hm”, siger den lille, sorte hest. ”jeg henter min ven fåret. Hesten galopperer, hesten galopperer hen til det lille, hvide fårs hus.
'Hmmm,' says the little black horse, 'I'll fetch my friend the sheep.' The horse gallops, the horse gallops to the little white sheep's house.
'Hmmm' dit le petit cheval noir, 'je vais chercher mon ami, le mouton.' Le cheval galope, le cheval galope vers la maison du petit mouton blanc.

line.words: Toc, toc, toc! 'C'est qui?' dit le petit mouton blanc. 'C'est moi, le petit cheval noir. Viens m'aider, s'il te plaît.' 'Oui, j'arrive tout de suite.'

subtitle.line: Knock, knock, knock! 'Who's there?' says the little white sheep.'It's me, the little black horse. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Knock, knock, knock! 'Who's there?' says the little white sheep.'It's me, the little black horse. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Banke, banke, banke på! ”Hvem er det?”, siger det lille, hvide får. ”Det er mig, den lille, sorte hest. Vil du godt komme og hjælpe mig?” ”Ja, jeg kommer straks”.
Knock, knock, knock! 'Who's there?' says the little white sheep.'It's me, the little black horse. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Toc, toc, toc! 'C'est qui?' dit le petit mouton blanc. 'C'est moi, le petit cheval noir. Viens m'aider, s'il te plaît.' 'Oui, j'arrive tout de suite.'

line.words: Alors les deux amis retournent au pommier. Le mouton voit la belle pomme rouge. 'Oh!' dit le petit mouton blanc. 'Quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

subtitle.line: So the two friends go back to the apple tree. The sheep sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little white sheep, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'

So the two friends go back to the apple tree. The sheep sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little white sheep, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
Så de to venner går tilbage til æbletræet. Fåret ser det smukke, røde æble. ”Åh”, siger det lille, hvide får, ”det er et smukt, rødt æble. Jeg vil virkelig gerne spise det smukke, røde æble.

So the two friends go back to the apple tree. The sheep sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little white sheep, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'

line.words: 'Vite, vite!' dit le petit cheval noir, 'monte sur mon dos.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval. Il essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

subtitle.line: 'Quick, quick,' says the little black horse, 'climb onto my back.' The sheep climbs onto the horse's back. He tries to pick the apple but it’s impossible!
'Quick, quick,' says the little black horse, 'climb onto my back.' The sheep climbs onto the horse's back. He tries to pick the apple but it’s impossible!
“Hurtigt, hurtigt”, siger den lille, sorte hest, “kravl op på min ryg.” Fåret kravler op på kestens ryg. Han prøver at plukke æblet, men det er umuligt.

So the two friends go back to the apple tree. The sheep sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little white sheep, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
'Vite, vite!' dit le petit cheval noir, 'monte sur mon dos.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval. Il essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

line.words: 'Hmmm' dit le petit mouton blanc, 'je vais chercher mon ami le lapin.' Le mouton court, le mouton court vers la maison du petit lapin gris.

subtitle.line: 'Hmmm' says little white sheep, 'I'll fetch my friend the rabbit.' The sheep runs, the sheep runs to the little grey rabbit's house.
'Hmmm' says little white sheep, 'I'll fetch my friend the rabbit.' The sheep runs, the sheep runs to the little grey rabbit's house.

Toc, toc, toc! 'C'est qui?' dit le petit lapin gris. 'C'est moi, le petit mouton blanc. Viens m'aider, s'il te plaît.' 'Oui, j'arrive tout de suite.'

line.words: Alors les deux amis retournent au pommier. Le lapin voit la belle pomme rouge. 'Oh' dit le lapin gris, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

subtitle.line: So, the two friends go back to the apple tree. The rabbit sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the grey rabbit, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
So, the two friends go back to the apple tree. The rabbit sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the grey rabbit, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
Så de to venner går tilbage til æbletræet. Kaninen ser det smukke, røde æble. ”Åh”, siger den lille, grå kanin, ”det er et smukt, rødt æble. Jeg vil virkelig gerne spise det smukke, røde æble.
So, the two friends go back to the apple tree. The rabbit sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the grey rabbit, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
Alors les deux amis retournent au pommier. Le lapin voit la belle pomme rouge. 'Oh' dit le lapin gris, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

line.words: 'Vite, vite' dit le mouton blanc, 'monte sur ma tête.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval, le lapin monte sur la tête du mouton. Il essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

subtitle.line: 'Quick, quick,' says the white sheep, 'climb onto my head.' So, the sheep climbs onto the horse's back, the rabbit climbs on to the sheep's head. He tries to pick the apple but it’s impossible!
'Quick, quick,' says the white sheep, 'climb onto my head.' So, the sheep climbs onto the horse's back, the rabbit climbs on to the sheep's head. He tries to pick the apple but it’s impossible!
“Hurtigt, hurtigt”, siger det hvide får. ”Kravl op på mit hoved”. Så fåret kravler op på hestens ryg, og kaninen kravler op på fårets hoved. Han prøver at plukke æblet, men det er umuligt.
'Quick, quick,' says the white sheep, 'climb onto my head.' So, the sheep climbs onto the horse's back, the rabbit climbs on to the sheep's head. He tries to pick the apple but it’s impossible!
'Vite, vite' dit le mouton blanc, 'monte sur ma tête.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval, le lapin monte sur la tête du mouton. Il essaie de prendre la pomme mais c'est impossible!

line.words: 'Hmmm' dit le petit lapin gris, 'je vais chercher mon amie la souris.' Le lapin sautille, le lapin sautille vers la maison de la petite souris marron.

subtitle.line: 'Hmmm,' says the little grey rabbit, 'I'll fetch my friend the mouse.' The rabbit hops, the rabbit hops to the little brown mouse's house.
'Hmmm,' says the little grey rabbit, 'I'll fetch my friend the mouse.' The rabbit hops, the rabbit hops to the little brown mouse's house.
“Hm”, siger den lille, grå kanin. ”Jeg henter min ven musen”. Kaninen hopper, kaninen hopper hen til den lille, brune mus’ hus.
'Hmmm,' says the little grey rabbit, 'I'll fetch my friend the mouse.' The rabbit hops, the rabbit hops to the little brown mouse's house.
'Hmmm' dit le petit lapin gris, 'je vais chercher mon amie la souris.' Le lapin sautille, le lapin sautille vers la maison de la petite souris marron.

line.words: Toc, toc, toc! 'C'est qui?' dit la petite souris marron. 'C'est moi, le petit lapin gris. Viens m'aider s'il te plaît.' 'Oui, j'arrive tout de suite.'

subtitle.line: Knock, knock, knock! 'Who is there?' says the little brown mouse. 'It's me, the little grey rabbit. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Knock, knock, knock! 'Who is there?' says the little brown mouse. 'It's me, the little grey rabbit. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Banke, banke, banke på! ”Hvem er det?”, siger den lille, brune mus. ”Det er mig, den lille, grå kanin. Vil du godt komme og hjælpe mig?” ”Ja, jeg kommer straks”.
Knock, knock, knock! 'Who is there?' says the little brown mouse. 'It's me, the little grey rabbit. Please come and help me.' 'Yes, I'll come straight away.'
Toc, toc, toc! 'C'est qui?' dit la petite souris marron. 'C'est moi, le petit lapin gris. Viens m'aider s'il te plaît.' 'Oui, j'arrive tout de suite.'

line.words: Alors les deux amis retournent au pommier. La souris voit la belle pomme rouge. 'Oh' dit la petite souris marron, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

subtitle.line: The two friends go back to the apple tree. The mouse sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little brown mouse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
The two friends go back to the apple tree. The mouse sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little brown mouse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
De to venner går tilbage til æbletræet. Musen ser det smukke, røde æble. ”Åh”, siger den lille, brune mus, ”det er et smukt, rødt æble. Jeg vil virkelig gerne spise det smukke, røde æble.
The two friends go back to the apple tree. The mouse sees the beautiful red apple. 'Oh,' says the little brown mouse, 'that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.'
Alors les deux amis retournent au pommier. La souris voit la belle pomme rouge. 'Oh' dit la petite souris marron, 'quelle belle pomme rouge. Je voudrais bien manger la belle pomme rouge.'

line.words: 'Vite, vite' dit le petit lapin gris, 'monte sur mon nez.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval, le lapin monte sur la tête du mouton et la souris monte sur le nez du lapin.

subtitle.line: 'Quick, quick,' says the little grey rabbit, 'climb onto my nose.' So the sheep climbs onto the horse’s back, the rabbit climbs onto the sheep’s head and the mouse climbs onto the rabbit’s nose.
'Quick, quick,' says the little grey rabbit, 'climb onto my nose.' So the sheep climbs onto the horse’s back, the rabbit climbs onto the sheep’s head and the mouse climbs onto the rabbit’s nose.
“Hurtigt, hurtigt”, siger den lille, grå kanin. ”Kravl op på min næse.” Så fåret kravler op på hestens ryg, kaninen kravler op på fårets hoved, og musen kravler op på kaninens næse.
'Quick, quick,' says the little grey rabbit, 'climb onto my nose.' So the sheep climbs onto the horse’s back, the rabbit climbs onto the sheep’s head and the mouse climbs onto the rabbit’s nose.
'Vite, vite' dit le petit lapin gris, 'monte sur mon nez.' Donc, le mouton monte sur le dos du cheval, le lapin monte sur la tête du mouton et la souris monte sur le nez du lapin.

line.words: Elle étend la main et... elle prend la belle pomme rouge.

subtitle.line: The mouse reaches out her hand and... she picks the beautiful red apple.
The mouse reaches out her hand and... she picks the beautiful red apple.
Musen rækker hånden ud og… hun plukker det smukke, røde æble.
The mouse reaches out her hand and... she picks the beautiful red apple.
Elle étend la main et... elle prend la belle pomme rouge.

line.words: 'Youpi!' crie la petite souris marron et elle descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit lapin gris et il descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit mouton blanc et il descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit cheval noir.

subtitle.line: 'Hoorah!' cries the little brown mouse and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little grey rabbit and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little white sheep and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little black horse.

'Hoorah!' cries the little brown mouse and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little grey rabbit and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little white sheep and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little black horse.
“Hurra”, råber den lille, brune mus og kravler ned. ”Hurra”, råber den lille, grå kanin og kravler ned. ”Hurra”, råber det lille, hvide får og kravler ned. ”Hurra”, råber den lille, sorte hest.

'Hoorah!' cries the little brown mouse and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little grey rabbit and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little white sheep and climbs down. 'Hoorah!' cries the little black horse.
'Youpi!' crie la petite souris marron et elle descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit lapin gris et il descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit mouton blanc et il descend. 'Youpi!' crie le petit cheval noir.

line.words: Croc, croc, croc. Les quatre amis mangent la belle pomme rouge. Miam!

subtitle.line: Munch, munch, munch. The four friends eat the beautiful red apple. Yum!
Munch, munch, munch. The four friends eat the beautiful red apple. Yum!
Æde, æde, æde. De fire venner spiser det smukke, røde æble. ”nams, nams, nams!”
Munch, munch, munch. The four friends eat the beautiful red apple. Yum!
Croc, croc, croc. Les quatre amis mangent la belle pomme rouge. Miam!

line.words: Puis le petit cheval noir galope à la maison. Au revoir!

subtitle.line: Then the little black horse gallops home. Goodbye!
Then the little black horse gallops home. Goodbye!
Så galopperer den lille, sorte hest hjem. Farvel!
Then the little black horse gallops home. Goodbye!
Puis le petit cheval noir galope à la maison. Au revoir!

line.words: Le petit mouton blanc court à la maison. Au revoir!

subtitle.line: The little white sheep runs home. Goodbye!
The little white sheep runs home. Goodbye!
Det lille, hvide får løber hjem. Farvel!
The little white sheep runs home. Goodbye!
Le petit mouton blanc court à la maison. Au revoir!

line.words: Le petit lapin gris sautille à la maison. Au revoir!

subtitle.line: The little grey rabbit hops home. Goodbye!
The little grey rabbit hops home. Goodbye!
Den lille, grå kanin hopper hjem. Farvel!
The little grey rabbit hops home. Goodbye!
Le petit lapin gris sautille à la maison. Au revoir!

line.words: Et la petite souris marron trottine à la maison. Au revoir!

subtitle.line: And the little brown mouse scurries home. Goodbye!
And the little brown mouse scurries home. Goodbye!
Og den lille, brune mus piler hjem. Farvel!
And the little brown mouse scurries home. Goodbye!
Et la petite souris marron trottine à la maison. Au revoir!
